text: Robert Montgomery (May 21, 1904 â€“ September 27, 1981) was an American actor and director. He was born in Beacon, New York. He starred in many movies, including Night Must Fall. He died in New York City from cancer. He was cremated. ==Other websites== * Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Cancer deaths in New York (state) Category:Presidents of the Screen Actors Guild Category:1904 births Category:1981 deaths
